attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Limit the definition of homophobia/anti-gay speech to the act of saying hate-filled accusatory words or physical assault toward one who believes they are homosexual. This should not include respectful disagreement of the lifestyle, particularly in the Church.  
Christians, though we disagree with the acts on Biblical basis, love this group of people and care deeply for their needs.

Allow those who have come out of this lifestyle the freedom to say how and why they did (and there are many of these), without fear of condemnation. 

Agree respectfully to disagree respectfully.
